thread.title: Team News: Mahrez back for Leicester against Palace
thread.title_full: Team News: Mahrez back for Leicester against Palace

title: Team News: Mahrez back for Leicester against Palace
text:
Team News: Mahrez back for Leicester against Palace © Getty Images Riyad Mahrez has been recalled to the Leicester City team for this afternoon's clash with Crystal Palace at the King Power Stadium. Filed: Saturday, October 24, 2015 at 14:09 UK Last Updated: Saturday, October 24, 2015 at 14:09 UK 
Riyad Mahrez has been recalled to the Leicester City team for this afternoon's clash with Crystal Palace at the King Power Stadium. 
Leicester City: Schmeichel, Simpson, Huth, Morgan, Fuchs, Albrighton, Kanté, Drinkwater, Schlupp, Mahrez, Vardy. Subs: Schwarzer, De Laet, King, Kramaric, Okazaki, Dyer, Inler 
Crystal Palace: Hennessey; Mariappa, Dann, Hangeland, Kelly; McArthur, Cabaye; Puncheon, Sako, Bolasie; CampbellSubs: Speroni, Delaney, Jedinak, Mutch, Ledley, Zaha, Bamford 
More to follow. Read Next:   match previews newsletter! Updates are sent twice a week.
